question: Create a Pod `my-pod-with-volume` with a `busybox` container running `sleep 3600`. Mount an `emptyDir` volume named `workdir` at `/app/data`.
suggested_answer:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: my-pod-with-volume
spec:
  containers:
  - name: my-container
    image: busybox
    command:
    - sh
    - -c
    - sleep 3600
    volumeMounts:
    - name: workdir
      mountPath: /app/data
  volumes:
  - name: workdir
    emptyDir: {}
